title: Hardship Review Progress Schema
description: Data contract for Hardship Review Progress Items in the Court Data API

dateRequested.description: The date the action was taken

dateRequired.description: The date by which an response is required

dateCompleted.description: The date the response was received

progressAction.description: The hardship review progress action codes

progressResponse.description: The hardship review progress response codes

removedDate.description: The date the progress item was removed

userCreated.description: ID of the user creating the progress item
